Nodes¶

Vivamus aliquam fringilla metus, sit amet tempor lectus pretium non. Integer et tempor eros. Donec posuere dignissim nulla, non rutrum ipsum gravida ut. Maecenas nec lectus eget metus congue blandit. Suspendisse sed tortor vel neque vestibulum iaculis nec non mi. Nam porttitor vehicula pharetra.

Common properties¶

The properties below apply to all node styles.

Text properties¶

fontName¶

Name of the font used to draw the text in the node.

Type
String
Default
“Gill Sans”
lineHeight¶

Lineheight of the node text expressed as a multiplier of the font size.

Type
Number
Default
1.3
textAlign¶

Alignment of the text within the node. The value <em>auto</em> aligns the text left, right or center, depending on the node’s orientation (center is used for the root node).

Type
Enum
Values
left | right | center | justify | auto
Default
auto
justifyMinLines¶

Minimum number of lines for the <em>justify</em> text alignment to take effect. If the total number of lines is less than this value, the text will be centered instead.

Type
Number
Default
5
hyphenate¶

Controls whether the node text is hyphenated.

Type
Boolean
Default
yes
maxTextWidth¶

Maximum text width inside nodes.

Type
Number
Default
240.0
textPadX¶

Horizontal padding around the bounding box of the node text.

Type
Number
Default
fontSize * 1.0
textPadY¶

Vertical padding around the bounding box of the node text.

Type
Number
Default
fontSize * 0.45
textBaselineCorrection¶

Node text baseline correction factor.

Type
Number
Default
-0.2

Stroke properties¶

strokeWidth¶

Stroke width of the outline of the node shape.

Type
Number
Default
1.3

Node shadow properties¶

nodeDrawShadow¶

Controls whether the node shape casts a shadow.

Type
Boolean
Default
no
nodeShadowColor¶

Node shadow color.

Type
Color
Default
rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)
nodeShadowBlur¶

Node shadow blur radius.

Type
Number
Default
3.0
nodeShadowOffsX¶

Horizontal offset of the node shadow.

Type
Number
Default
2.5
nodeShadowOffsY¶

Vertical offset of the node shadow.

Type
Number
Default
2.5
textDrawShadow¶

Controls whether the node text casts a shadow.

Type
Boolean
Default
no

Text shadow properties¶

textShadowColor¶

Text shadow color.

Type
Color
Default
rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
textShadowOffsX¶

Horizontal offset of the text shadow.

Type
Number
Default
-0.6
textShadowOffsY¶

Vertical offset of the text shadow.

Type
Number
Default
-0.6
drawGradient¶

Controls whether the node shape should be filled using a linear top-down gradient.

Type
Boolean
Default
no
gradientTopColor¶

Color of the top of the node if the node shade is filled with a gradient.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor.lighten(.12)
gradientBottomColor¶

Color of the bottom of the node if the node shade is filled with a gradient.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor.darken(.04)

‘box’ style¶

Properties¶

boxOrientation¶

3D orientation of the box.

Type
Enum
Values
topleft | topright | bottomleft | bottomright
Default
topright
boxDepth¶

3D depth of the box.

Type
Number
Default
20 * pow(0.7, depth)
horizSideColor¶

Color of the horizontal side of the 3D box.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor.lighten(0.34)
vertSideColor¶

Color of the vertical side of the 3D box.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor.lighten(0.12)
strokeColor¶

Stroke color of the box.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor

‘line’ style¶

Properties¶

None.

‘oval’ style¶

Properties¶

aspectRatio¶

Initial aspect ratio of the oval.

Type
Number
Default
1.0
maxWidth¶

Maximum width of the oval (the initial aspect ratio is kept until this width is reached).

Type
Number
Default
400.0

‘poly’ style¶

Properties¶

numSides¶

Number of sides of the regular polygon

Type
Number
Default
6
rotation¶

Rotation around the center point

Type
Number
Default
0

‘rect’ style¶

Properties¶

roundness¶

Rectangle roundess (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)

Type
Number
Default
1.0
cornerRadius¶

Corner radius if rounding style is ‘arc’.

Type
Number
Default
5.0
roundingStyle screen¶

Rectangle roundng style.

Type
Enum
Values
screen, arc
Default
screen
